content: > i have created a full video tutorial master class for this pattern you can find it here 1 **details** * pattern consists of 24 rounds * level is intermediate * stitches/terms skip slip_stitch chain single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet tc improved csdc bp fp cluster popcorn decrease small picot ---------------------------------------------- **languages** this pattern is available in english spanish and russian if you are able and desire to translate the pattern into your native language please use this form to contact me 2 only authorized translations are permitted * *russian language translation provided by ula tomaszewska and tested by tatyana norri and наталья коваленко * * *spanish/espanol language translation and testing provided by virginia padilla and tere gomis * ------------------------------------------- **community** join our discussion and support group for designs by grace fearon on facebook 3 join our discord channel 4 *thank you so very much to my testers on this pattern marla austin cille heckenbach juanita carol jena duncan and siva oduri * 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=chrl43_hjua 2 http //www gracefearon com/pattern-translator-application 3 https //www facebook com/groups/878254922303627/ 4 https //discord gg/atndgvj
